title: List all containers
description: List all containers including stopped ones

title: Run interactive
description: Run a command in a new container interactively

title: Stop container
description: Stop one or more running containers

title: Build image
description: Build an image from a Dockerfile

title: Exec bash
description: Run a command in a running container

title: View logs
description: Fetch the logs of a container

title: Compose Up
description: Builds, (re)creates, starts, and attaches to containers for a service

title: Compose Down
description: Stop and remove containers, networks, images, and volumes
